name: Destruction
overview: A Lunar Lander type game released under several names, Nuclear Attack, Delta Race and finally Destruction with Robtek. In this game it is the year 3060 and an excavation in the great northern desert has triggered an ancient 20th century nuclear missile. It is due to launch in 5 minutes. In order to detonate the missile and save the earth, you must enter the subterranean silo, negotiate the passages and attach an explosive. Once set, you have 2 minutes to get clear.
